text: Ekkadu Srinivasan Lakshmi Narasimhan (born 1945) is an Indian politician. He was the 1st Governor of Telangana from 2014 to 2019. He also was Governor of Andhra Pradesh from April 2004 to August 2007 and Governor of Chhattisgarh from January 2007 to December 2009. He was the Director of the Intelligence Bureau from February 2005 to December 2006. Narasimhan was Governor for 12 years making him the longest-serving Governor in India. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Chhattisgarh Category:Governors of Andhra Pradesh Category:Governors of Telangana
title: E. S. L. Narasimhan
